name: Hexagone (KrispyKarim517, Puffles, JoeBertolini, ryangreen)
description:
You're getting warm, Warmer, WARMER, YOUR'RE ON FIRE!

Find the sweet spot by revealing tiles which tell you whether you are getting hot or cold (hot being closer to the sweet spot and cold being further away). You have 30 seconds and only 3 spot reveals to find the sweet spot.
